mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_info WHERE user_id = #{userId} and user_pw = SHA2(#{userPw},256)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info (user_id, user_pw, user_nick, building_name, room_number, ardu_id) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userNick}, #{buildingName}, #{roomNumber}, #{arduId})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_info SET user_pw = #{userPw}, user_nick = #{userNick}, building_name = #{buildingName}, room_number = #{roomNumber} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
